page.title: 07Climate and Conservation
page.content: The Northern part of our area including most of Langford comes into the Wickham Bishops Nature Conservation Zone.No new houses can be built in this area except for agriculture and forestry workers.The same applies to Ulting,the Southern part of wich comes into the Danbury Conservation Zone. Athough our area has a reservoir and two rivers it does not have a great rainfall - Except for this year.The little shop at Langford was flooded when 1\" of rain fell in 20 minutes on 5'th June - More than the normal for all of June.
